raw_body: SAMARASEKERA – MRS NELLIE – Beloved wife of late Charlie Samarasekera (Attorney-at-Law),​ beloved mother of Udithanjalie (UK),​ Dhammika (SL) and Manjula (USA),​ expired. Funeral on 20th July 2023 at Matara General Cemetery at 4.30 p.m. Cortege leaves No. 38/​1,​ Esplanade Road,​ Uyanwatta,​ Matara at 4.00 p.m.044368
